headline: /C O R R E C T I O N -- Ball Corporation/
summary: Ball Corporation (NYSE: BALL) announced today it has completed the closing of its new revolver and term loan senior secured credit facilities that refinance its existing senior secured credit facilities entered into on June 28, 2022.

raw.headline: /C O R R E C T I O N -- Ball Corporation/
raw.summary: Ball Corporation (NYSE: BALL) announced today it has completed the closing of its new revolver and term loan senior secured credit facilities that refinance its existing senior secured credit facilities entered into on June 28, 2022.

headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock to Own for Decades and 2 That Underwhelm
summary: While the S&P 500 (^GSPC) includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds.
